item.description:
Come on out to Salem Willows and enjoy a day of fun walking the trails, exploring the beach, playing the arcades and have a nice day at the park.


5.29.10 UPDATE: When you signed up for this event you were asked if you wanted to bring a pot luck or eat at the concessions. General consensus is that everyone wants to eat at the concessions, so there will not be a potluck picnic at this event. Watch the calendar for a future event where we will have a potluck picnic.

The weather is supposed to be gorgeous for a day at the Willows, so grab your lawn chair, your hiking boots or your kayak...whatever gives you enjoyment and come on down.




Grab the Frisbee, wiffle ball bats and the beach chair and have a good time with new and old friends.

We believe that there is Kayaking but if you are interested in this, please call Salem Willows ahead of time for details.

Salem Willows has Arcades and a variety of food concessions. Also when you RSVP for this meetup you will be asked if you would prefer to bring a potluck picnic lunch.

Children are welcome at this event. There is Free Admission and Free Parking at this event.

This event is weather permitting, raindate for this event will be the following day May 31, 2010.

If you are not able to find us call the Meetup Cell phone at 978-304-2811.

Hope to see you at the park
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the picnic table with the Red baloon
item.name: A Day of Fun @ Salem Willows
